ChoiceFeature.Name: Magic Initiate
ChoiceFeature.Text: Choose a class: bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard. You learn two cantrips of your choice from that class’s spell list. In addition, choose one 1st-level spell from that same list. You learn that spell and can cast it at its lowest level. Once you cast it, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it again. Your spellcasting ability for these spells depends on the class you chose: Charisma for bard, sorcerer, or warlock; Wisdom for cleric or druid: or Intelligence for wizard.

MultiFeature.Name: Magic Initiate (Bard)
MultiFeature.Text: Gain 2 Bard cantrips and a level 1 Bard spell. You learn that spell and can cast it at its lowest level. Once you cast it using this feat, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it using this feat again. Your spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.
